name: Robert Mundell
institution: Johns Hopkins University (1959–61, 1997–98, 2000–01) ,  University of Chicago (1965–72) ,  University of Waterloo (1972–74) ,  McGill University (1989–1990)<ref name
alma_mater: London School of Economics, UBC Vancouver School of Economics, University of Washington, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, University of Waterloo
influenced: Arthur Laffer, Jude Wanniski, Rudi Dornbusch, Jacob Frenkel, Michael Mussa, Carmen Reinhart
contributions: Mundell–Fleming model, Optimum currency areas, Research on the gold standard
